title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Bitcoin Cash gains nearly 40% to become ‘best performing’ L1 of the year
contentSnippet: Bitcoin Cash has outpaced every major L1 in 2025, boosted by clean supply dynamics and renewed investor demand.

title: 「ビットコインを価値の橋渡し役に」Bitcoin Japan CEO、繊維業からの大転換とAI戦略を語る
contentSnippet: 東証上場の堀田丸正から「ビットコインジャパン」へ大胆に転換したフィリップ・ロード（Phillip Lord）CEOが、CoinPost独占インタビューでビットコイン準備金戦略とAIインフラ投資の詳細を明かした。「日本の品質×米国の規模」で2030年までに500MW規模のデータセンター投資を目指す。

title: French banking giant BPCE to launch in-app crypto trading: Report
contentSnippet: BPCE will let millions of customers buy and sell BTC, ETH, SOL and USDC directly inside its banking apps.

title: South Korea to impose bank-level liability on crypto exchanges after Upbit hack: Report
contentSnippet: South Korea plans to hold crypto exchanges to the same no-fault compensation standards as banks after an Upbit hack exposed major gaps in consumer protection.

title: Ether supply squeeze looms with exchanges holding lowest levels since 2015
contentSnippet: Ether exchange balances dropped to a decade low of 8.7% as more ETH moved into staking and custody, setting up a potential supply squeeze.

title: Bitcoin Faces Japan Rate Hike: Debunking The Yen Carry Trade Unwind Alarms, Real Risk Elsewhere
contentSnippet: Speculators maintain net bullish positions in the yen, limiting scope for sudden JPY strength and mass carry unwind.

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、イーサリアム「フサカ」実装完了やソラナスマホの独自通貨発行計画など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナなど主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: Bitcoin buries the tulip myth after 17 years of proven resilience says ETF expert
contentSnippet: ETF expert Eric Balchunas argued Bitcoin's 17-year track record and multiple recoveries make tulip mania comparisons obsolete despite recent criticism.

title: Rising Bitcoin ‘liveliness’ indicator suggests bull market may continue: analysts
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s liveliness indicator reached new peaks, suggesting strong demand despite lower prices and signaling the bull market cycle may not be over yet.

title: 週刊ニュース｜JPモルガンによるストラテジーのBTC売却回避能力の評価やFRBのQT終了に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、FRBの量的引き締め終了、チャールズ・シュワブの仮想通貨取引開始、JPモルガンによるストラテジーのビットコイン売却回避能力の評価に関する記事が関心を集めた。

title: State of Crypto: Wrapping Up the Month
contentSnippet: Congress continues to make progress on crypto issues but things are moving slowly.

title: BitMine buys $199M in Ether as smart money traders bet on ETH decline
contentSnippet: The largest corporate Ether holder continues to buy the dip, as the industry’s most profitable traders continue to bet millions on ETH’s short-term decline.

title: Crypto Holiday Gift Guide 2025
contentSnippet: At a loss for what to buy the crypto fan in your life this festive season? Look no further than Decrypt’s holiday gift guide.

title: French Banking Giant BPCE to Roll Out Crypto Trading for 2M Retail Clients
contentSnippet: The service will allow customers to buy and sell BTC, ETH, SOL, and USDC through a separate digital asset account managed by Hexarq.

title: ‘European SEC’ proposal sparks licensing concerns, institutional ambitions
contentSnippet: Legal experts are concerned that transforming ESMA into the “European SEC” may hinder the licensing of crypto and fintech in the region.

title: Two Casascius Coins Holding 2K BTC Moved After 13 Years of Inactivity
contentSnippet: The Casascius coins were designed as offline cold storage with embedded private keys, but the project was shut down in 2013 due to regulatory pressure from FinCEN.

title: Bitcoin profit metric eyes 2-year lows in 'complete reset:' BTC analysis
contentSnippet: Bitcoin long-term holders lost interest in selling at $90,000, new research showed, as profitability of their BTC supply dried up.

title: Coinbase Sees Crypto Recovery Ahead as Liquidity Improves and Fed Rate Cut Odds Climb
contentSnippet: The crypto exchange also took note of a so-called AI bubble that continues to go strong and a weaker U.S. dollar.

title: Professor Coin: When Bitcoin Sneezes—How Crypto and Equities Caught the Same Cold
contentSnippet: Academic literature finds that during periods of economic stress, correlations and spillovers between cryptocurrencies and equities spike.

title: How Much Longer Until We Consider the Bitcoin Power Law Model Invalid?
contentSnippet: As the gap between spot bitcoin price and the power law widens, investors are left questioning whether mean reversion is coming or if another cornerstone model is approaching its end.

title: The Grandma Test: When Your Mom Can Use DePIN, Mass Adoption Has Arrived
contentSnippet: Mass adoption doesn't happen when crypto enthusiasts start using the technology: it happens when your grandma does it without even realizing it, argues Uplink co-founder Carlos Lei.

title: Anthony Pompliano's Bitcoin Treasury Firm ProCap BTC Closes SPAC Merger Deal
contentSnippet: Shares in the company fell more than 50% this week as the merger approval went forward.

title: Stablecoin Adoption Is ‘Exploding' — Here's Why Wall Street Is Going All-In
contentSnippet: Alchemy co-founder and president Joe Lau said stablecoin adoption is exploding as banks, fintechs and payment platforms push beyond the USDT/USDC exchange era.

title: LUNC Surges Over 160% in a Week as Do Kwon Sentencing and Token Burns Draw Traders
contentSnippet: The rally is driven by speculation that a final verdict could bring clarity to the project, as well as technical factors like token burns.

title: 仮想通貨市場構造を定める「クラリティ法案」を遅滞させる3つの争点とは？　専門家見解
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨に詳しい弁護士が、ビットコインなどについて米国の規制を明確化する「クラリティ法案」の年内進捗は期待薄だと見解。3つの争点が議論のハードルだと指摘する、

title: メタマスク、予測市場取引機能を導入　ポリマーケットと連携しウォレット内で完結
contentSnippet: メタマスクが12月4日、トラストウォレットが12月2日に予測市場機能を相次いで発表した。ユーザーは自己管理型ウォレット内で実世界のイベント結果を予測し仮想通貨で取引できるようになる。

title: SBI VCトレードとサッポロビール、黒ラベルTHE BARリニューアル記念でNFT配布キャンペーン開始
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所SBI VCトレードとサッポロビールがWeb3技術を活用した実証実験を12月5日に開始した。黒ラベルTHE BARのリニューアルを記念し、応募者全員にNFTを配布。保有者は店舗で特別なビール体験が受けられる。

title: ブラックロックのビットコイン現物ETF「IBIT」、5週連続で資金流出　4200億円規模に
contentSnippet: ブラックロックの仮想通貨ビットコイン現物ETF「IBIT」から5週連続で約4200億円が流出した。上場以来最長の流出超過を記録。同社の事業開発ディレクターは「正常な動き」と述べた。

title: 米SEC、仮想通貨プライバシー円卓会議を来週開催　ジーキャッシュ創設者も参加
contentSnippet: 米証券取引委員会が金融監視とプライバシーをテーマにした円卓会議を12月15日に開催予定。ジーキャッシュ創設者ゾーコ・ウィルコックス氏を含む専門家がパネリストとして参加し、仮想通貨の匿名技術と監視措置について議論を行う。

title: トム・リーのビットマイン、今週約9.8万ETHを追加購入　総保有額1.8兆円相当
contentSnippet: ビットマインは今週もETHの押し目買いを実施し9万7650イーサリアムを追加購入した。アーカムのデータによると、同社の総保有額は1.8兆円に達しETH総供給量の3.16%を占めている。

title: 東証プライム上場のKLab、ビットコインと金を組み合わせた財務戦略を発表　36億円規模
contentSnippet: KLabは、仮想通貨ビットコインと金を財務資産に組み込むデュアル・ゴールド・トレジャリー戦略を実施すると発表。同日発表した資金調達で得る約51億円のうち36億円を充当する。

title: New 'Postal' Game Canceled One Day After Reveal, Following Generative AI Allegations
contentSnippet: Postal: Bullet Paradise has been scrapped and the developer is shutting down after gamers claimed the trailer used generative AI assets.

title: Cantor Slashes Strategy Price Target By 59%, Remains 'Long-Term Bullish' on Bitcoin Giant
contentSnippet: Cantor Fitzgerald analysts significantly lowered their price target for Strategy (MSTR) shares, while reiterating an “Overweight” rating.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP Dive as Liquidations Hit $500 Million—While Stocks Rise
contentSnippet: Bitcoin is back below the $90,000 mark as Ethereum flirts with another dip below $3,000—all while major stock indices stay green.

title: Indiana Lawmaker Pushes for Bitcoin in Pensions, Crypto Payment Protections
contentSnippet: A lawmaker in Indiana introduced legislation that would broaden access to Bitcoin and crypto exposure for savers in the Midwestern state.

title: Trump DOJ Wants Terra Founder Do Kwon Behind Bars for 12 Years, Citing SBF Sentence
contentSnippet: Federal prosecutors reserved the right to pursue up to 12 years for Terra founder Do Kwon in an August plea deal. Now, they’re seeking that maximum.

title: Maryland Man Sentenced for Helping North Korea Infiltrate US Tech Firms
contentSnippet: The scheme enabled overseas DPRK operatives to access sensitive government systems through fraudulent IT jobs.

title: 2-4% Crypto Dip! Sovereign Wealth Funds Buying BTC! CTFC approves U.S. Spot Crypto!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors were broadly lower, falling 2–4% with BTC down 2% at $91,400, ETH down 2% at $3,130, BNB down 2% at $893, and SOL down 4% at $136, while ZEC (+4%) and TRX (+2%) led the day’s top movers.

title: Beeple Made Robot Dogs With Musk, Zuckerberg, and Warhol Heads That Poop NFTs
contentSnippet: The installation at Art Basel is framed as a critique of algorithmic control, merging machine perception with on-chain “memories.”
